metadata.synopsis: A nudge for the player to go to sleep to continue the story. Plays after player returns from Astral Prism having met the Emperor and after the GD in which the group reflects on the fact that the dream visitor was a mind flayer all along.
metadata.how_to_trigger: In the return to camp after EmperorRevealed, walk around the empty camp.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: An eventful night. Time to get some rest, I think.
